item.title: Goldman Sachs upgrades Twilio, sees more than 35% upside ahead
item.description: Even after a 20% surge on Friday, Goldman Sachs thinks Twilio shares have further room to run.

item.title: Take-Two Interactive gets an upgrade from UBS as Grand Theft Auto VI hype builds
item.description: Take-Two Interactive Software has "a grand pipeline" ahead thanks to its upcoming release of the Grand Theft Auto VI video game, according to UBS.

item.title: Here are Monday's biggest analyst calls: Nvidia, Apple, Tesla, Marvell, Microsoft, Meta, Take-Two, Amazon, Twilio and more
item.description: Here are Monday's biggest calls on Wall Street.

item.title: TD Cowen says DeepSeek sell-off could be the Nvidia entry point traders have been waiting for
item.description: Investors who missed out on Nvidia's massive run last year may have another opportunity to get in the trade, according to TD Cowen.

item.title: D.R. Horton gets a downgrade from Bank of America as housing market outlook dampens
item.description: D.R. Horton's outlook appears murky amid a tough macro environment, says BofA.
